name: Sri Lankan Elephant
description: The Sri Lankan elephant is one of three recognized subspecies of the Asian elephant, and native to Sri Lanka.

name: Leopard
description: The Sri Lankan leopard is a leopard subspecies native to Sri Lanka. It is the country's top predator.

name: Purple-faced langur
description: The purple-faced langur is an Old World monkey endemic to Sri Lanka. It is a highly social animal and lives in troops.
